name: AdBuddiz
description:
AdBuddiz is a premium ad network.

With our solution, monetizing your app is as easy as writing two lines of code :
[AdBuddiz cachedAds];
[AdBuddiz showAd];

Our solution will provide:
- Interstitial: static & video
- Rewarded video
